page.title: 08Fire and Police Services
page.content: { Auchtermuchty Fire Station}area covers {Auchtermuchty, Ladybank, {Falkland and Pitcairlie.}There are 11 part time firemen. They meet once a week and do a standard test and are ready for any fires at any hour. It (roughly) takes 3 minutes from their houses to the station. Every year they deal with 200_250 fires.{Fife Fire {Brigade Headquarters are at Thornton.} {Auchtermuchty Police Station} employs 5 policemen and 1 civilian typist. The station is 40yrs old. Auchtermuchty doesn't have a lot of crime. The most common crimes are motoring offences. The most serious was an armed bank robbery in Ladybank. The area covered by Auchtermuchty Station is{Trafalgar Crossroads, {Newington, Newburgh, Ladybank}and{ {Gateside. Fife Police Headquarters}are at{Dysart.
